Plot: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.
Title: It's Complicated
Actors: Meryl Streep, Steve Martin, Alec Baldwin, John Krasinski
tomatoConsensus: Despite fine work by an appealing cast, It's Complicated is predictable romantic comedy fare, going for broad laughs instead of subtlety and nuance.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 8 wins & 12 nominations.
